Sentencas: Increasing progress in the field of renewable energy, thanks to the low cost of its resources and increasing public awareness of environmental issues, has led to wide use of these resources in power networks.
Titulo: Dynamically modelling and locating solid oxide fuel cells and optimally designing fuzzy stabilisers for multi-machine system

Sentencas: Among various types of renewable sources, Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC) have the most potential to connect to the grid as a clean source of electricity according to their attributes.
Titulo: Dynamically modelling and locating solid oxide fuel cells and optimally designing fuzzy stabilisers for multi-machine system

Sentencas: This paper presents a new method for mathematical modelling of multi-machine grids including large-scale SOFC.
Titulo: Dynamically modelling and locating solid oxide fuel cells and optimally designing fuzzy stabilisers for multi-machine system

Sentencas: Since the installation location of SOFC in large-scale networks impacts grid dynamics, it is important to dynamically locate it.
Titulo: Dynamically modelling and locating solid oxide fuel cells and optimally designing fuzzy stabilisers for multi-machine system

Sentencas: This study locates SOFC via the objective function of grid dynamics.
Titulo: Dynamically modelling and locating solid oxide fuel cells and optimally designing fuzzy stabilisers for multi-machine system

Sentencas: Grid connected SOFC generation can effectively and efficiently improve small signal stability.
Titulo: Dynamically modelling and locating solid oxide fuel cells and optimally designing fuzzy stabilisers for multi-machine system

Sentencas: Hence, considering the small disturbance fluctuations and the design of an optimal controller is necessary for the stability of a power system.
Titulo: Dynamically modelling and locating solid oxide fuel cells and optimally designing fuzzy stabilisers for multi-machine system

Sentencas: Consequently, the present study investigates the design of a FLPSO-based power system stabiliser to improve the system's small frequency oscillations.
Titulo: Dynamically modelling and locating solid oxide fuel cells and optimally designing fuzzy stabilisers for multi-machine system

Sentencas: The results of the simulation demonstrate that this controller guarantees the stability of the power system during low frequency disturbances.
Titulo: Dynamically modelling and locating solid oxide fuel cells and optimally designing fuzzy stabilisers for multi-machine system
